faqs.answer_en: Magamba High School is a government secondary school in Lushoto, Tanga region, dedicated to providing quality education.
faqs.answer_sw: Shule ya Sekondari Magamba ni shule ya serikali iliyoko Lushoto, mkoa wa Tanga, inayotoa elimu bora kwa wanafunzi.

faqs.answer_en: You can check student exam results in the Results section of our website.
faqs.answer_sw: Unaweza kuangalia matokeo ya mitihani ya wanafunzi kwenye sehemu ya Matokeo ya tovuti yetu.

faqs.answer_en: You can reach us via the Contact page, which includes phone numbers and email addresses.
faqs.answer_sw: Unaweza kuwasiliana nasi kupitia ukurasa wa Mawasiliano, ambapo kuna namba za simu na barua pepe.

faqs.answer_en: Magamba High School is located in Lushoto district, Tanga region, Tanzania.
faqs.answer_sw: Shule ya Sekondari Magamba ipo wilaya ya Lushoto, mkoa wa Tanga, Tanzania.

faqs.answer_en: Admissions are handled through government placement. For private inquiries, please visit the Contact page.
faqs.answer_sw: Uandikishaji wa wanafunzi unafanywa kupitia mfumo wa serikali. Kwa mawasiliano binafsi, tafadhali tembelea ukurasa wa Mawasiliano.

faqs.answer_en: Magamba High School is a government school, so there are no tuition fees.
faqs.answer_sw: Shule ya Sekondari Magamba ni shule ya serikali, hivyo hakuna ada ya masomo.

faqs.answer_en: We offer a wide range of subjects including Mathematics, Sciences, Languages, and Humanities.
faqs.answer_sw: Tunafundisha masomo mbalimbali ikiwemo Hisabati, Sayansi, Lugha, na Masomo ya Jamii.

faqs.answer_en: You can find the latest school announcements in the Announcements section of our website.
faqs.answer_sw: Unaweza kupata matangazo ya hivi karibuni ya shule kwenye sehemu ya Matangazo ya tovuti yetu.

faqs.answer_en: Visit the Gallery section of our website to see school photos and events.
faqs.answer_sw: Tembelea sehemu ya Picha kwenye tovuti yetu kuona picha na matukio ya shule.
